headline: Candidates Critical of Trump on Iran, but Vague on What They’d Do
abstract: The candidates were short on specifics at Tuesday’s debate when pressed on how they would accomplish their key foreign policy goals.
lead_paragraph: The six Democratic presidential candidates who debated Tuesday night in Des Moines agreed on one point: President Trump threw away a nuclear deal that was working and is now recklessly speeding toward war with Iran.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
